releaseNotes: Aloha! This is a huge update. The app should feel at least 2x more responsive.
The API has been completely re-written in Golang as a production grade server
The older versions of app and the API will no longer work after May 2021
Here is what's new in the app:
- App is now compiled using Kotlin JVM IR backend
- Updated dependencies and toolchains to latest versions
- Also, API server now lies in Helsinki
